There was one other sighting in Montreal on or around July 17th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsAt 1h00 AM, a Golden Star appeared at the eastern horizon. Vertically the star slowly climp up in the sky for approximatly 1 hour. After, the Golden Star perfectly diagonally climb up in the sky until approximatly 5h00 AM, then disapeared. Very nice and sweet light. Very enjoyable.
